subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the seven weeks leading up to Friday, the Minnesota Twins won 34 of 42 games, an .810 rate of winning that would compute to an astonishing 131 victories for a full season.
snippet: In the seven weeks leading up to Friday, the Minnesota Twins won 34 of 42 games, an .810 rate of winning that would compute to an astonishing 131 victories for a full season.
